en.title: Confirm that you do not wish to give your consent to the divorce

detailsText.para1: If you don't agree, then the divorce won't be able to continue based on 2 years separation with consent.
detailsText.para2: The application will be returned to your {{ session.divorceWho }}. If they choose to continue, they will need to change the reason for divorce to one that doesn't need your consent.
detailsText.para3: Your {{ session.divorceWho }} will have to pay £{{ feesAmendDivorce }} to change the reason. You may have to pay some or all of this extra fee if they've applied to claim their divorce costs.

en.notice: You should get legal advice if you're not sure.
